message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $15000.  It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.  Let me know your thoughts!
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints.  While $8000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to compromise. How about $11000? This would be a fair price for both of us.  Let me know what you think.
I'm still a bit above my budget with $11000. I'd be willing to go up to $9000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Would you be willing to meet me at $9000?
